text: This is why I donâ€™t trust reviews from journos who Apple chooses to review their products. They overlook the flaws that make the machine unusable. And all the gushing over what? A new CPU? Please. I can't tell what CPU any machine is running, and neither can you, unless you open the system About box. My main concern about the new Macs with the new CPU is if VMWare runs on them, and if I can run "Frontier" in there. Otherwise forget it. I'll stick with my Intel iMac Pro I bought in 2017.
